Posts.Content: evejones wrote: I went for an ultrasound biopsy of a fibroadenoma ? in the L breast. The radiologist did an ultrasound evaluation of both breasts. The R breast had shown 2 cysts, two months ago at another centre. This radiologist found them as well but did not agree with the previous diagnosis, because she said they were not entirely black but had some white specs within.She thought they may be complex cysts. She then found that the cyst was connected to a duct which appeared enlarged and also appeared black. She was not sure what it was - perhaps a papilloma. This cyst and enlarged duct was not found on mammogram, apparently because the dense tissue was masking them. Has anyone else had anything similar. How did it appear on ultrasound and what further tests were done. Eve Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: evejones wrote: Hi, I went for an ultrasound of the R breast because of a suspected fibroadenoma. The radiologist did a check of the L breast and found the following. Two months before, I was told this lesion was a simple cyst. This is the radiologist report: On the left side at 12 o'clock, there is a hypoechoic mass with lo level internal echoes at 12 o'clock, 3cm from the nipple with maximal dimensions of 6.9mm. On radial imaging, this mass is seen to be continuous with a lobulated, ill defined secondary component, with maximal dimesions of the total mass being 15 mm. The second component has a vascular margin. The lesion on the left side is complex and partly ill-defined . It may represent a benign lesion such as blocked duct with inspissated secretions. Alternatively, it may represent an intraduct papillary lesion, and a neoplasm cannot be excluded on these appearances. I have suggested that we needle the left lesion. I am sick with worry. Have not been able to speak to my doctor. How concerned should I be about the vascular margin. Any thoughts input would be appreciated. Anyones ultrasound been similar. Eve Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Frightening ultrasound report: Please help evejones yellowfarmhouse
